attributes.action: Hold a live TV debate on the EU referendum involving leaders from both sides.
attributes.background: Many people are yearning for more information, and deeper debate, regarding the in/out EU referendum on Thursday June 23rd 2016. A televised debate, or series thereof, calling on the leaders from both sides of the argument could part satisfy this.

rejection.details: The decision to schedule this debate would be for the broadcasters to make, not the Government or Parliament.
